Sales Development Representative

Join one of the most promising blockchain companies to transform and upgrade financial markets, making transfers of value quick, easy, and secure.

About Tokeny

At Tokeny, we are recognized as a global Blockchain50 company and backed by Euronext, Inveniam, Apex Group and K20 Fund. Over $28 billion worth of assets has already been tokenized via our solutions. We provide an enterprise-grade tokenization platform for financial actors to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using distributed ledger technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.

Due to the over-centralization of the current finance technical infrastructure, it is complicated for investors to find private markets opportunities, to access them, and to manage their portfolio. There is indeed a very poor asset transferability with little to no liquidity. By applying trust, compliance and control on a hyper-efficient infrastructure, Tokeny enables market participants to unlock significant advancements in the transferability and liquidity of financial instruments.

Are you interested in accelerating the digitalization of financial markets via blockchain technology? Join Tokeny to make history!

TOP REASONS TO WORK WITH US
  • 🤑 Fully funded company with an existing ecosystem of customers (50+) and partners
  • 🌏 Human-sized international company with 10+ different nationalities
  • 🔥 Be part of an ultra-talented, experienced & highly productive, passionate team
  • 🚀 Great growth potential and a focus on innovation
  • 🖥 Remote, Hybrid, Asynchronous environment that adapts to you
  • 🛋 Flexible WFH policies and great benefits
  • 🤗 Strong agility and quality culture with a unique vision
  • 🍻 Regular team-building activities & special work events and traditions
  • 💰 Year-end bonuses and other financial compensations
  • 📈 Active Employee Stock Options plan
  • 🗣 Company sponsored tech talks and happy hours
  • ⛓ Contribute to open source projects
  • 🧠 Peer to peer learning and in-company tech brainstorm groups
  • 🤝 Senior dev mentoring program
  • 🧑‍💻 Hackathons participation

Job description

As Tokeny’s SDR your main focus will be on reaching out, prospecting and deciding if a lead is qualified or not. You’ll be involved in the entire inbound pipeline.

Responsibilities
  • Organise first calls with leads in order to qualify them and advise them on their projects
  • Generate a sales pipeline for the rest of the sales team
  • Research potential prospects before reaching out to them
  • Define and follow sales processes and influence the marketing strategy and tactics.
  • Trigger prospects curiosity and attractiveness towards Tokeny
  • Your main objective is to pass on leads that match designated criteria as sales-qualified leads (SQLs) to an account executive or account manager to close
  • Organize and maintain Tokeny’s CRM with details for each lead, their current status and next steps
  • Communicate all predefined metrics to the team
  • Remain fully informed on market trends and solutions
Required Professional Expertise
  • Fluent English
  • Financial background and knowledge of blockchain
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Active listening skills
  • Empathy and great interpersonal skills
  • Good time management skills, including prioritizing, scheduling, and adapting as necessary
  • Experience with CRM and sales tools
Nice-to-have
  • Interested in blockchain technologies
  • Interested in Fintech
  • Any other language is a plus
